docs.lead_paragraph: Federal health officials have asked the nation’s physicians to report all cases of children with limb weakness to determine whether there is a link to enterovirus 68, which is sickening thousands.

headline.main: Limb Frailty in Children Is Studied for Link to Enterovirus 68
headline.print_headline: Limb Frailty in Children Is Studied for Link to Virus

docs.abstract: Federal health officials are asking nation’s physicians to report all cases of children with limb weakness to determine whether there is a link to enterovirus 68, which is sickening thousands.
